mapper.select: SELECT uf.FONT_ID, uf.USER_ID, uf.FONT_FAMILY, uf.FONT_URL, uf.IS_CUSTOM, uf.CREATED_AT, u.USERNAME, u.EMAIL FROM USER_FONTS uf LEFT JOIN USERS u ON uf.USER_ID = u.USER_ID WHERE uf.USER_ID = #{userId} ORDER BY uf.CREATED_AT DESC

SELECT uf.FONT_ID, uf.USER_ID, uf.FONT_FAMILY, uf.FONT_URL, uf.IS_CUSTOM, uf.CREATED_AT, u.USERNAME, u.EMAIL FROM USER_FONTS uf LEFT JOIN USERS u ON uf.USER_ID = u.USER_ID WHERE uf.USER_ID = #{userId} AND uf.FONT_FAMILY = #{fontFamily}

SELECT uf.FONT_ID, uf.USER_ID, uf.FONT_FAMILY, uf.FONT_URL, uf.IS_CUSTOM, uf.CREATED_AT, u.USERNAME, u.EMAIL FROM USER_FONTS uf LEFT JOIN USERS u ON uf.USER_ID = u.USER_ID WHERE uf.FONT_ID = #{fontId}
